entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Expose Id on System.Diagnostics.ActivityContext #97899
    Future
  • Enable .NET 9 developers to build more intelligent apps #97896
    9.0.0
  • Position information lost when calling `JsonSerializer.Deserialize` overloads accepting `Utf8JsonReader`. #97893
    Future
  • [jitstress] Assertion failed '!"Inconsistent profile data"' #97892
    9.0.0
  • ValidateEnumeratedItemsAttribute does not validate Dictionaries #97873
    Future
  • API for side-channel free decryption of RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 ciphertexts #97866
    Future
  • Remove RequiresUnreferencedCode from DefaultValueAttribute #97842
  • Remove trim warnings from ComponentModel APIs that take Type as a parameter #97841

Closed

  • ILogger throws System.FormatException in .net8 but the same code works in .net7 #97852
    Future
  • UdpClient don't receive packets (Mac OS) #97718
  • [Jit] Redundant comparisons are not eliminated #35348
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Reflection.Attributes #91620
    9.0.0
  • Null or empty array configuration does not update corresponding bound model property #97857
  • JIT: Extraneous jumps around alignment in some cases after `BBJ_NONE` removal #96998
    9.0.0
  • The `m_CallConv` of `System.String::Ctor` is inconsistent with `System.String::.ctor` #97499
    Future
  • SemaphoreSlim.Dispose does not work #97851
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Assert failure in PutThumb2BlRel24 #97750
    Future
  • JsonSerializer: Allow out-of-order reading of metadata properties. #72604
    9.0.0
  • NAOT: isinst with multiple guesses without fallback #97602
    Future
  • Remove designer related attributes from ComponentModel when trimming applications #97840
  • [wasm] WBT tests using `BrowserRunner` seem to hang on a subsequent `dotnet new` #97054
  • .NET runtime's method of loading Assemblies breaks Win32 LoadLibrary behavior #90839
  • Update of libunwind to 1.8.0 has broken remote unwind #97343
    9.0.0
  • `[LibraryImport]` throws `NotImplementedException` on `ref readonly` parameters #97706
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Make Enumerable.First/Last/GetElement faster on various enumerables #97905
    area-System.Linq
  • IL test entry points should be in types so test discovery can occur. #97904
    test-bug, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Initialize R12 pointer from context in StackFrameIterator #97903
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Alternative fix for ARM64 signed small type cmpxchg without LSE #97902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Try to fold basic arithmetic operations as part of import #97901
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_EG_3A, IF_SVE_EY_3A, IF_SVE_EZ_3A #97900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: Set edge likelihoods during patchpoint transformation #97897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move ManagedHost project for host tests to pre-built test asset #97894
    test-enhancement, area-Host, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Stop trying to format HOST_RUNTIME_CONTRACT property with locale settings #97891
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 8.0.x
  • Fix regex lazy loop handling of backtracking state at max iteration limit #97890
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Unify formatting part of BigInteger of CoreLib #97889
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add ARM64 encoding for group IF_SVE_CK_2A #97887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add Arm64 encoding for groups IF_SVE_CV_3A and IF_SVE_CV_3B #97886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add encoding for ARM64 IF_SVE_CJ_2A instruction group #97885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/6.0-staging] Update SqlClient and ship Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #97884
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-staging] Update SqlClient and ship Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #97883
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update SystemDataSqlClientVersion from 4.8.5 -> 4.8.6 #97882
    area-System.Data
  • Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #97881
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add support for Vector<T>.Indices and Vector.CreateSequence #97880
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Force sourceUrl with a suffix .cdp #97879
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove synchronization from Http2Connection.ExtendWindow #97878
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V] Skip ComputeReturnFlags in ArgIteratorTemplate::HasRetBuffArg #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Cosh/Sinh/Tanh for double #97874
    area-System.Numerics
  • [MT][browser] Fix running in-tree sample apps #97872
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Fixes exception while debugging on Chrome as IDE #97871
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser][ws] fix ConnectAsync_CancellationRequestedInflightConnect_ThrowsOperationCanceledException #97868
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] TypeNameParser #97864
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][llvm] Remove an llvm restriction which is not needed anymore. #97862
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono][aot] Allow valuetype sharing for more sizes. #97860
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [HTTP] Regenerated ref #97858
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NativeAOT][8.0] Use ld_classic in ILC build and in build integration #97856
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move `DevirtualizationManager` to `NodeFactory` #97855
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix reflection-getting function pointer fields #97854
    area-System.Reflection
  • Standardize on using code location for interior asm code references #97853
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][jit] Fix passing of byref arguments in m… #97850
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.x
  • Avoid allocating HashSet in Distinct() for some counts #97845
    area-System.Linq
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove use of `NewHolder<>` as field. #97843
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Enable TensorPrimitives.Sigmoid vectorization for double #97846
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: remove fallthrough limitations from redundant branch optimizer #97722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set DisableArcadeExcludeFromBuildSupport & support DotNetBuildTests flag #97762
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Devirtualize more methods deemed final by whole program view #97867
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Return all error messages instead of throwing on the first error in linker tests #97605
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_DW_2A, IF_SVE_DW_2B, IF_SVE_EB_1B #97800
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Update ILLink.CodeFixProvider.csproj #97796
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Move SB metadata to intermediates #97888
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Allow jump-to-next-block removal for blocks with alignment #97011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable IL stripping in System.Runtime.Tests for Apple mobile #97870
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add ARM encoding group IF_SVE_CI_3A #97808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Enable native AOT for non-portable crossgen2 #97536
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix referencing System.Linq in configuration source gen #97844
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [workloads] Update net8 mobile workload definitions #97824
    area-Build-mono
  • [debugger][mt] Unify multithreading switches #97861
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Fix unwinding over floating point registers #97863
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update HasThis check for String constructors in interpreter. (#97499) #97849
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Bail out on IMAGE_REL_BASED_THUMB_BRANCH24 with >24-bit addends #97756
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JsonSerializer] Add support for out-of-order metadata reads. #97474
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Late cast expansion: multiple candidates #97773
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[wasm][debugger] Do not send to IDE the eval scripts" #97876
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Use Expm1 in TensorPrimitives.Tanh #97859
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Source built short stack support #97725
    source-build, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Unblock WBT that are not hanging anymore #97764
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Prevent misoptimization by clang #97811
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] ELF ARM: Produce different relocation type for B and BL #97823
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove use of `NewHolder<>` as field. #97837
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix isKnonwNonNull for box and unbox #97799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for ref-readonly in the .NET interop source generators #97720
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Patch libunwind to hotfix validation pipe creation race #97817
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • STJ: Avoid duplicate initialization of required or init-only properties #97726
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Mark most specific static DIM for types marked RelevantToVariantCasting #97487
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Implement faster RSA key check #97827
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance
  • Create directory for Binding Tools For Swift #97208
    area-Meta
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IF_4A` to `SVE_JK_4B` #97739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Generalize `optSetPreheaderWeight` #96843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ARM64 signed small type cmpxchg for 8.0 atomics #97839
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] dispatch across threads via emscripten #97669
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Handle open types to appear in interface maps #97733
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Force sourceUrl with a suffix .cdp #97702
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 8.0.3
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser] Use standard xunit test runner on multithreaded runtime #91317
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse(powerOfTen) #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fix consistency issue in GetKeyedServices with AnyKey #97561
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add Sve.IsSupported support #97814
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixes exception while debugging on Chrome as IDE #97838
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96254
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Unified intrinsics emission front-end experiments #91993
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [RISC-V] Implement replacing safe-point call instructions under GC_STRESS #97818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Make RandomAccess.Read*|Write* methods work with non-seekable files #96711
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Add sudo to dmesg call in test run template #97624
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Rework the special instantiation type logic to be more effective #95490
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement timers on Browser #2505

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable `System.Runtime.Tests` in CI (for Browser) #2506
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix the missing time zone data index #2504
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Work around LLVM issues with null checks #2500
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix the `Math.Round` intrinsic #2503
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Zero shadow locals using a single `memset` #2498
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Integrate thread pool into the event loop #2502
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update Application-Insights dependency to 2.20 #38513
  • Misleading build error with no traces in binlog when MAUI workloads are not installed #38501
  • Update CLI help description for --auth option, SingleOrg choice #38479
  • Generating satellite assemblies causes a lot of unnecessary work #38478

Closed

  • mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:8.0 does not exists for windows containers #38502
  • 'dotnet test' broken after upgrading .NET SDK from 7.0.302 to 8.0.100 #38473

PullRequests

Created

  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #38507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to Unified Build controls #38506
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38505
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

Merged

  • Update BaselinePackageValidator.cs #38509
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Use NetToolMinimum for Compatibility tools #38485
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Issue #37501] Verbosity Options default to `minimal` from `quiet` #38277
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Expression blocks #3086
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Update absolute links to relative #7900

Updated

  • Interceptors open issues for C# 13 #7835
  • Determine element type for write-only CollectionBuilder collection types #7895

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# Collection Expression for arrays can't be outlined / folded in text editor #71932
    Backlog
  • C# Text Editor: Options to sort fields, properties and methods #71930
  • Separate reference count. Invocation and inheritance are shown in two parts. #71928
  • Overloaded operators is not correctly colorized #71924

Closed

  • Typing semicolon character into inactive C# preprocessor region repositions caret first #71933
  • Unable to go-to-def on a `ValueTuple` #71680
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34526.79 #71943
  • Wrong 'Cast is redundant.' #71926
  • Async Foreach loops with Instantiated Lists in async function autocomplete does not create valid response #71937
  • Automatic C# code formatting following the the-factor standard set by prettier for typescript #71929

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify serialization code #71944
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use v3 publishing for PR validation #71941
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adjust public API based on API review feedback #71940
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Prepare 17.10 snap #71939
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • PR feedback in object serialization. #71935
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move SB metadata to intermediates #71934
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prevent error propagations by misplaced semicolon in list parsing #71931
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle Lock type in VB #71927
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update absolute links to relative #71925
  • Disallow ref kind mismatch for dynamic arguments in non-ComImport scenarios. #71923
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Change an ApplyChangeToWorkspace overload to remove some async #71830
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unnecessary usage of generics #71942
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disable complete statement in non-user code #71936
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fixed the Go To Definition for ValueTuple #71912
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Improve syncing of project cones. #71826
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not remove necessary cast to System.Delegate when present #71938
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove support for base extensions #71883
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix code that errantly assumed a paramarray parameter must be an array #71920
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations during NamespaceSymbol.LookupNestedNamespace #71921
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update `Lock` object feature status #71889
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main into features/vscode_net8 #71922
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, untriaged

Updated

  • Add `Lock` object feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Sit object reader/writer on top of pipes. #71880
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use `/generatedfilesout` in generated SyntaxTree.FilePath #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Refactors LSP server extension assembly loading #71862
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Let the formatter format the whitespaces when converting an ArrowClauseExpression to a ReturnStatement when applicable #71757
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Helping runtime diagnose a CI bug #71913
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Prevent error propagations by misplaced semicolon in list parsing #71712
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch the BuildHost to build with net6.0 again #71881
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Upgrade Language Server to run on .NET 8 #71903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fail tests if errors are reported #71893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined conversions #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Improve use of SyntaxContext in snippet and method/type import completion providers #71872
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Align `params` type validation with the the spec #71918
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Report better warnings and errors if build hosts exit abnormally #71909
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Setting Application name using WebApplicationOptions causes FileNotFoundException #53791
  • ASP Net 6 does not work correctly on IIS #53788
  • Perf regression: plaintext #53780
  • How to properly serialize `ValidationProblemDetails` from middleware through `IProblemDetailsService`? #53779

Closed

  • Allow deletion of Data Protection keys #53502
    9.0.0
  • Blazor wasm progress-bar transition does not behave correctly on mobile browsers #53781
  • microsoft.aspnetcore.components.webview v8.0.1 nuget BUG #53318
  • Isolated JS for RazorComponentResult #53741
  • Perf improvement: json, mapaction #53573
  • Perf regression: updates #53767

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix casing of ProblemDetails for RFC compliance #53792
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0.x
  • Upgrade karma-firefox-launcher to v2 #53787
    area-signalr, 6.0.x
  • Update Selenium #53775
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6a59382` to `4565741` #53783
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • Fix casing of ProblemDetails for RFC compliance #53789
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview2
  • Add entry for freebsd-arm64 #53786
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview2
  • [main] (deps): Bump martincostello/update-dotnet-sdk from 3.1.2 to 3.1.3 #53784
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Prevent NRE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52821
    area-auth, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dddb219` to `4565741` #53755
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Add ForgotPasswordRequest to STJ source generation context #52830
    Servicing-approved, area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Move SB metadata to intermediates #53749
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient version to 4.0.5 #53772
    tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #53774
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Update Microsoft.Data.SqlClient version to 2.1.7 #53771
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient version to 4.0.5 #53770
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • Change nullability annotation of HostString.Value to explictly allow null #53568
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Better document the difference between `DumpType.Normal` and `DumpType.Triage` #4491
  • `dotnet-trace` speedscope report: the call of one method is divided into different pieces #4490

PullRequests

Created

  • feat: dumphttp command initial implementation #4488

Merged

  • Fix a few Watson/!analyze issues #4492
  • Move SB metadata to intermediates #4487

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Grouped CollectionView content/items overlaps on iOS when data changes or when pull to refresh data #20336
  • No hot reaload #20334
  • .NET MAUI CollectionView doesn't scroll inside of Expander #20330
  • Blazor hybrid app and "error CS5001: Program does not contain a static 'Main' method suitable for an entry point" #20329
  • VS cannot find generated proto code, when I try to build for windows #20328
  • The ScrollTo instruction of ListView(IsGroupingEnabled=True) will go down a wrong line. #20327
  • Maui custom namespace not working when in current project #20326
  • Adjust the width of the application window, the height of CarouselView will be halved, and the high probability of left and right jitter. #20325
  • Typo in MAUI AboutAssets.txt #20324
  • In MAUI TitleView on non-modal pages, a horizontally centered control is not centered on the screen #20323
  • MAUI .NET 8.0 AOT Compilation Always Fails with a Suggestion to set PublishTrimmed = false #20322
  • [iOS] Grouped CollectionView with a Footer stutters under MAUI 8.0.6 #20320
  • maui accessibility FlyOutItem not speaking by screenreader #20319
  • Unable to Start Android Instance of .Net Maui Intro #20318
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps control is currently broken on Android #20317
  • Itext or pdfsharp problem being investigated by Jon. #20316
  • failed java.lang.RuntimeException: com.android.tools.r8.CompilationFailedException: #20315
  • iOS - MediaPicker.PickPhotoAsync() doesn't pick Photo in second attempt, if Limited permission is given to Gallery #20311
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI SQL Server doesn't work in release mode #20307
    Backlog
  • DeviceDisplay.Current.MainDisplayInfoChanged not fired if app is in background (Android) #20305
  • Problems with .NET Maui Hybrid Blazor Foreground Service #20303

Closed

  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: The specified child already has a parent. Easy to repro #20310
    Backlog
  • [Essentials] Secure storage on Android GetAsync returns null even after Set #20292
  • Android crash when adding a View to a Layout that is already in another Layout #15920
    Backlog
  • Android Platform App Theme does not automatically update when switching themes #15723
    Triaged
  • Pangesture does not trigger exit/completed/cancel event while pan moves outside of the layout/control #5191
    .NET 8 SR3

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx preview1] Update with preview1 changes #20321
  • If the current thread dispatcher is null return the app level dispatcher #20313
  • [net9.0] Update dependencies to preview.2 #20304
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Revert "Dont build net8" #20286
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Housekeeping] Enabling ignored tests #20129
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-reenable
  • [WinUI] Fix gif animation initial state #20169
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 SR3
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, stale, area/gestures

Updated

  • Fix TableView rendering on Android #19473
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Don't remeasure TableView if specs are the same #20130
    area/ListView
  • - [Android] Fix ShouldShowToolbarButton for FlyoutPage #18522
    platform/android 🤖, area/FlyoutPage, community ✨, stale
  • [Trimming] Improve TypedBindings #19995
    area/app-size 🤏
  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale, memory-leak 💦
  • [Core][Hosting] Resolve handler services through registered service types #20298
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Adding a test to validate loading images #20147
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR3
  • Fix modal page push in immersive mode #19903
    community ✨, area/modal
  • Update SecureStorage.android.cs #20293
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-picker
  • Add new Keyboards for Prompt #20194
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area/keyboard

  • Add Frame observer for UIWindow frame changes #20237

  • Makes KeyboardAutoManager.GoToNextResponderOrResign public #18667

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make ParameterExtractingExpressionVisitor capable of extracting paths to evaluatable fragments in the tree #32999
  • Add support for [MemberNotNull] for Entity Framework properties #32997
  • Please provide an extension method for EF and Linq2DB to have clear join tables such as Inner Join, Left Join, and Right Join. #32994
  • Exact match search does not work in a nested collection that is mapped as JSONB #32993
  • ValueConverters do not detect changes when using ChangeTrackingProxies / ChangedAndChangingNotifications #32992

Closed

  • Accidentally using field instead of property for JSON metadata produce hard to understand exception #32939
    9.0.0-preview2
  • Please provide an extension method for EF Core and Linq2DB to have clear join tables such as Inner Join, Left Join, and Right Join. #32995
  • How to build CASE statement when using ExecuteUpdate #32990

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix to #32939 - Accidentally using field instead of property for JSON metadata produce hard to understand exception #32966

Updated

  • Cleanup asserts #32968
  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #32721
  • Stop throwing eagerly when looking up a ValueGenerator #32930
  • Add fill factor to keys and unique constraints #32900
  • Fix lock loosing in concurrency detector for multiple contexts on one thread #31891
    blocked, needs-design
  • Translate to NULLIF #32710
    blocked

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SdkResolver layout to work for Desktop and Core MSBuild #18505
  • Bootstrap SB SDK and artifacts #18504

Merged

  • Add preview 1 to the table #18392
  • Fix repo builds not getting propagated when using the minimal console log and fix runtime build #18501
  • [main] Delete security-partner-dotnet pipeline #18502
  • Stop using OverrideTargetRid, use TargetOS/TargetArchitecture instead #18476
  • Delete security-partner-dotnet pipeline #18496
  • Respect ci switch for source-only builds #18497

Updated

  • Separate out the test exclusions that apply to stable SDKs #18423
  • Support for short stack builds. #18463
  • Stop making src modifications to every repo's NuGet.config #18478
  • Add VMR unified build pipelines #18409
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #18334
    Branch Lockdown
